history.proof: intros B l1 l2 c f H_perm. induction H_perm. - reflexivity. - simpl. shelve. - apply fold_left_permutation. + intros. symmetry. shelve. + auto. - shelve.

chat.content:
A: Type
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall (B : Type) (l1 l2 : list B) (c : nat) (f : B -> nat), permutation l1 l2 -> fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l1 c = fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l2 c

Related definitions and lemmas:
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
fold_plus_split : forall (B : Type) (l : list B) (c : nat) (f : B -> nat), c + fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l 0 = fold_left (fun (a : nat) (b : B) => a + f b) l c
fold_left_permutation : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A), (forall (a : A) (b1 b2 : B), f (f a b1) b2 = f (f a b2) b1) -> forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), permutation l1 l2 -> fold_left f l1 a = fold_left f l2 a
fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list B), fold_left f (l1 ++ l2) a = fold_left f l2 (fold_left f l1 a)
in_flat_map : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C) (b : B), In a (f b) -> In b l -> In a (flat_map f l)
permutation_map_ex_aux : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list B) (l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> l1 = map f l3 -> exists l4 : list A, permutation l4 l3 /\ l2 = map f l4
fold_left_eta : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l : list B) (a : A) (f1 : A -> B -> A), (forall (a0 : A) (b : B), In b l -> f a0 b = f1 a0 b) -> fold_left f l a = fold_left f1 l a
permutation_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (map f l1) (map f l2)
permutation_flat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (flat_map f l1) (flat_map f l2)
fold_left_rev_right : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> B) (l : list A) (i : B), fold_right f i (rev l) = fold_left (fun (x : B) (y : A) => f y x) l i
fold_left_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (C : Type) (a : A) (l : list C) (k : C -> B), fold_left f (map k l) a = fold_left (fun (a0 : A) (b : C) => f a0 (k b)) l a
in_flat_map_ex : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C), In a (flat_map f l) -> exists b : B, In b l /\ In a (f b)
permutation_map_ex : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B), permutation (map f l1) l2 -> exists l3 : list A, permutation l3 l1 /\ l2 = map f l3
fold_left_init : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (h : A -> A), (forall (a : A) (b : B), h (f a b) = f (h a) b) -> forall (a : A) (l : list B), fold_left f l (h a) = h (fold_left f l a)
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
all_permutations_aux_permutation : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n)
encode_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (c : code A), encode eqA_dec c (l1 ++ l2) = encode eqA_dec c l1 ++ encode eqA_dec c l2
Ordered.ordered_perm_antisym_eq : forall (A : Type) (order : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c) -> (forall a b : A, order a b -> order b a -> a = b) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> Ordered.ordered order l1 -> Ordered.ordered order l2 -> l1 = l2
List.fold_left_app : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B -> A) (l l' : list B) (i : A), fold_left f (l ++ l') i = fold_left f l' (fold_left f l i)
number_of_occurrences_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 + number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
permutation_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, {permutation l1 l2} + {~ permutation l1 l2}
add_frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list (A * nat) -> list (A * nat)
fold_left_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), fold_left (fun (x : nat) (_ : A) => S x) l 0 = length l
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
find_code_app : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l1 : code A) (l2 : list (A * list bool)), not_null l1 -> find_code eqA_dec a (l1 ++ l2) = match find_code eqA_dec a l1 with | nil => find_code eqA_dec a l2 | b1 :: l3 => b1 :: l3 end
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = a :: nil -> l2 = a :: nil
unique_key_in_inv : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : B) (l : list (A * B)), unique_key l -> In (a, l1) l -> In (a, l2) l -> l1 = l2
find_code_correct1 : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A) (a : A) (b : bool) (l : list bool), find_code eqA_dec a c = b :: l -> In (a, b :: l) c

intros B l1 l2 c f H_perm.
induction H_perm.
- reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite IHH_perm. reflexivity.
- apply fold_left_permutation.
  + intros. symmetry. apply Nat.add_comm.
  + assumption.
